data.name: Happy's Humble Burger Farm: Hypnosystemic (OST)
data.detailed_description: Hypnosystemic is a dreamy and somber album. It blends various elements of electronic music - downtempo, ambient, IDM, psychedelia, all with prog-rock sensibilities and a penchant for hip hop groove.
data.about_the_game: Hypnosystemic is a dreamy and somber album. It blends various elements of electronic music - downtempo, ambient, IDM, psychedelia, all with prog-rock sensibilities and a penchant for hip hop groove.
data.short_description: Hypnosystemic is a dreamy and somber album. It blends various elements of electronic music - downtempo, ambient, IDM, psychedelia, all with prog-rock sensibilities and a penchant for hip hop groove.
